archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0665
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to change my hardware order or personal details after I've purchased it (prior to dispatch) so that I can update my order if I need to.

properties.value: OOTB - cancel order before dispatching and start over or open an unsubmitted order to finish it. Need more details, what exactly should be modified to confirm feasibility from digital, in general - supported by the model, available in CRM. Updating personal details available in Selfcare OOTB. It is about changes of personal details, but also about a change of the ordered products (for example black iphones are out of stock and we want to allow customer to take a white one not to have to wait long for the delivery). Should be available for Customer an agent. Do not allow for changes that result in a price change (in such cases an order needs to be cancelled). For pre order: changing of device variant preferrably should not change the place in the queue. Open point: what in case a change of delivery address leads to change in delivery price/method. AP for VF to discuss.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
